adm:managed-object.name: error-log-account-status-notification-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
is a notification handler that writes information to the server error log whenever an appropriate account status event occurs.

adm:property.name: account-status-notification-type
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Indicates which types of event can trigger an account status notification.

adm:value.name: account-temporarily-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been temporarily locked after too many failed attempts.

adm:value.name: account-permanently-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been permanently locked after too many failed attempts.

adm:value.name: account-unlocked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been unlocked by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-idle-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been locked because it was idle for too long.

adm:value.name: account-reset-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been locked, because the password had been reset by an administrator but not changed by the user within the required interval.

adm:value.name: account-disabled
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been disabled by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-enabled
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user account has been enabled by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-expired
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user authentication has failed because the account has expired.

adm:value.name: password-expired
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user authentication has failed because the password has expired.

adm:value.name: password-expiring
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a password expiration warning is encountered for a user password for the first time.

adm:value.name: password-reset
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user's password is reset by an administrator.

adm:value.name: password-changed
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Generate a notification whenever a user changes his/her own password.
